name: Fighters end
description:
A 2D fighting game currently in progress. You can play the story or even 1v1 your friends. More will be added soon. Please enjoy!

-Credits to dragon ball for inspiration-

Music by me

Art by me

Scripting by me

Sound effects by Download Free Punch Sound Effects | Mixkit

Moving background code by another member of Burning Scale Studios - itch.io

This game can be played on browser although if downloaded make sure to update often as I am working alot on this project. Please consider donating and thanks for playing!

{WOP}

Youtube - Viper snake gamer - YouTube although not uploaded in a while.
